short_summary: The Department of National Defence required for supplying and delivering fresh eggs on an as and when requested basis.
description: The Department of National Defence, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is seeking to purchase fresh eggs an on an as and when requested basis. A Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) is being considered for the period of one year. The Department is seeking a vendor who can supply and deliver fresh eggs for: • Any static kitchen requiring fresh eggs; • Any Food Service Provider, exercising agency for Navy-esque vessels and fast ferries within a Coast Guard contingency.
duration_in_months: But the contract may be renewed for an additional year.
